tool_description: At Life Fitness, we commit to providing the best exercising experience by empowering others. With LFopen, developers and fitness facility owners can access the Life Fitness Application Programming Interfaces (API) to be able to extend the functionali
name: LFopen Web
title: LFopen Web

api_list.name: Get Results Workout
api_list.description: Retrieves workout progress of User between the specified dates

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Format : GMT Sign Hours : Minutes (e.g. "GMT-8:00") or GMT Sign Hours Minutes (e.g. "GMT-0800") or GMT Sign Hours (e.g. "GMT-8").

api_list.name: Get Results Daily
api_list.description: Retrieves Daily Progress of User between the specified dates

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Format : GMT Sign Hours : Minutes (e.g. "GMT-8:00") or GMT Sign Hours Minutes (e.g. "GMT-0800") or GMT Sign Hours (e.g. "GMT-8").

api_list.name: Get Lifefitness Results

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Format : GMT Sign Hours : Minutes (e.g. "GMT-8:00") or GMT Sign Hours Minutes (e.g. "GMT-0800") or GMT Sign Hours (e.g. "GMT-8").

api_list.name: Get user account details
api_list.description: Retrieves the user account details based on the User access token passed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://life-fitness-lfconnect-website1.p.rapidapi.com/user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "life-fitness-lfconnect-website1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Photo

api_list.name: Get Equipment list
api_list.description: Retreives all the equipments available.  This service retrieves the static values of equipment Ids and equipments. These values can be provided as an input to get the User workouts using /get_workoutlist service.  The workout results retrieval services holds these values to identify the equipment that the workout has been completed
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://life-fitness-lfconnect-website1.p.rapidapi.com/workoutpreset/get_equipment_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "life-fitness-lfconnect-website1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get GPS Results
api_list.description: Retrieves Workout results posted by User through GPS between the specified dates

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Format : GMT Sign Hours : Minutes (e.g. "GMT-8:00") or GMT Sign Hours Minutes (e.g. "GMT-0800") or GMT Sign Hours (e.g. "GMT-8").

api_list.name: Get Manualstrength Results
api_list.description: Retrieves Manual Strength workout results of User between the specifieddates

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Format : GMT Sign Hours : Minutes (e.g. "GMT-8:00") or GMT Sign Hours Minutes (e.g. "GMT-0800") or GMT Sign Hours (e.g. "GMT-8").

api_list.name: Get Summary Results
api_list.description: Read current progress information.  This service provides the progress information like calories,duration,workout span days and weights lifted per Day,Week,Month and Year. The currDate parameter value passed is considered as the current day till which the progress information is seeked.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Format : GMT Sign Hours : Minutes (e.g. "GMT-8:00") or GMT Sign Hours Minutes (e.g. "GMT-0800") or GMT Sign Hours (e.g. "GMT-8").

api_list.name: Get Workoutlist
api_list.description: The user creates custom workouts giving specific goals and parameters such as time/calories/distance. This service returns all the workout presets created by the user. The user selects any one of the preset in the Lifefitness equipment before starting a workout  If the equipmentIds are not mentioned, then this returns all the workouts available. This details provides the users preference of workouts and might help in suggesting similar workout regimens.  To provide the value for equipmentIds input, the service xx can be used to get the list of predefined equipmentIds and the desired value can be provided.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://life-fitness-lfconnect-website1.p.rapidapi.com/workoutpreset/get_workoutlist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "life-fitness-lfconnect-website1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
